attributes.action: Force the government to give exam level students the grades they were predicted
attributes.additional_details: The government must give exam level students their predicted grades such as those predicted by the SATS for year 11 students. This petition must be signed while it is still being decided what is to happen to exam level students
attributes.background: With the new uncertainty about exam grades, I believe that it is only fair that exam level students should get their predicted grades this is because if the students were to sit exams, they would no doubt be at a significant disadvantage, regardless of the potential concessions that could be made

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Education Secretary has said that this year the Government will "put our trust in teachers rather than algorithms": https://hansard.parliament.uk/commons/2021-01-06/debates/D2A64DD9-6A6B-4EAB-8001-C3BACDE25B02/Covid-19EducationalSettings

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Cancel GCSEs and A Levels in 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326066

Cancel GCSE and A-levels in 2021 replace with Course Work and Teacher Assessment: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/
